description: Sent whenever something happens to change this user's available reward balance (e.g. rewards given/expired/etc)
title: User Reward Balance Changed Webhook Schema

___resourceVersion.description: An integer value reflective of when the balance was generated, the greater the value the more recent the balance
___resourceVersion.title: Resource Version

___availableValue.description: The reward balance available to be redeemed
___availableValue.title: Available Reward Balance

___unit.description: The unit corresponding to this reward balance
___unit.title: Reward Balance Unit
